code: // ------------------------------------------------------------------------ @Override public void start(LeaderRetrievalListener listener) {     checkNotNull(listener, "Listener must not be null.").     synchronized (startStopLock) {         checkState(!started, "StandaloneLeaderRetrievalService can only be started once.").         started = true.         // directly notify the listener, because we already know the leading JobManager's address         listener.notifyLeaderAddress(leaderAddress, leaderId).     } }
@Override public void stop() {     synchronized (startStopLock) {         started = false.     } }
